tags.name: Wallet Pass Notification
tags.description: create, update, get, and delete wallet pass notifications

tags.name: Wallet Pass
tags.description: create, update, retrieve unblocked wallet passes

tags.name: Upload APIs
tags.description: APIs to upload files to the server

tags.name: Wallet Pass Location
tags.description: create, update, get, and delete wallet pass locations

get.description: This operation is used to get a wallet pass location by its id.

404.description: Wallet pass or location not found

put.description: This operation is used to update a wallet pass location.

delete.description: This operation is used to delete a wallet pass location

404.description: Wallet pass or location not found

get.description: Search for wallet passes based on various criteria.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: query is used to do text search by pass name case insensitive

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Zero based page index

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: includePassAssets
parameters.description: if passed true, results will include the links of the pass images

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: if passed true, only pass basic info will be returned

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: filter by pass id

parameters.name: passName
parameters.description: query is used to do exact search by pass name

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: filter by status list: Draft, Published

post.description: This operation is used to create both Apple and Google wallet passes.

requestBody.description: Request body for generating an Apple pass

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: text search by notification name case insensitive

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Zero based page index

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: passSerialNumber
parameters.description: Wallet pass id

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: status list: Draft, Scheduled, Processing, Published, Failed

post.summary: Create a notification for a wallet pass
post.description: Create a notification for a wallet pass. The notification can be sent immediately or scheduled for a later time.

204.description: Notification record has been created successfully.

get.description: This operation is used to search for wallet pass location.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: query is used to do text search by location name case insensitive

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Wallet pass location name

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The cursor to use for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: passSerialNumbers
parameters.description: Filter locations by pass serial numbers

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the wallet pass location

post.description: This operation is used to create a location for a specific wallet pass.

post.summary: Upload a file to the server
post.description: Upload a file to the server by providing the file data as a form-data parameter
Upload a file to S3 by providing the file data as a form-data parameter and the bucket name

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: Bucket name to upload the file to

post.description: Finalize the S3 copy operation using the key and extension of the object

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the object

parameters.name: extn
parameters.description: Extension of the object

200.description: S3 object finalized successfully, URL returned

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: wallet pass id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: wallet pass id

patch.description: Update an existing wallet pass by id. This will update both Apple and Google wallet passes.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: wallet pass id

requestBody.description: Request body for updating a pass

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: notification Id

parameters.name: notificationStatsCursor
parameters.description: notification stats page list cursor

parameters.name: notificationStatsLimit
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned for the notification stats

delete.description: Delete wallet pass notification by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: notification Id

patch.description: Update wallet pass notification. Only Draft or Scheduled notifications can be updated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: wallet pass id

get.description: Retrieve statistics for a specific wallet pass notification.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: notification Id

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: last notification stat link id record

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

200.description: Notification stat record has been retrieved successfully.

get.summary: Get a pre-signed URL to upload a file to S3
get.description: Get a pre-signed URL to upload a file to S3

createdTime.description: The time when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

updatedTime.description: The time when the entity was last updated in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

createdBy.description: The user who created the entity.

updatedBy.description: The user who last updated the entity.

workspaceId.description: The ID of the workspace to which this entity belongs.

name.description: Name of the location. This field is required and has a maximum length of 255 characters.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the location is enabled. If true, the pass may trigger a notification when the user is near this location. Default is true if not specified.

latitude.description: Latitude of the location in degrees. This field is required.

longitude.description: Longitude of the location in degrees. This field is required.

altitude.description: Altitude of the location in meters. Optional.

relevantText.description: Text to display on the lock screen when the user is near this location. This field is required and has a maximum length of 255 characters.

createdTime.description: The time when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

updatedTime.description: The time when the entity was last updated in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

createdBy.description: The user who created the entity.

updatedBy.description: The user who last updated the entity.

workspaceId.description: The ID of the workspace to which this entity belongs.

Account.description: Account which the pass belongs to. If it's not provided the system will automatically use the default account for the workspace.

description.description: Pass description. Apple: Displayed on the back of the pass, providing additional details. Google: Used as the main description of the pass, visible in the pass details.

organizationName.description: Organization name. Apple: Displayed on the lock screen and in the Wallet app, identifying the issuer. Google: Displayed at the top of the pass, identifying the issuer.

qrUrl.description: URL or text for the QR code.

qrText.description: QR text. It appears below the QR code.

locations.description: Locations. Apple: Defines geographic locations where the pass is relevant. The pass can appear on the lock screen when the user is near one of these locations. Google: Not supported.

fileName.description: The name of the pass image file, this is required when creating a wallet pass

uploadKey.description: The upload key of the image. This required when creating a wallet pass.

url.description: The URL of the uploaded image. Will be retrieved in GET operations.

UploadInfo.description: Wallet pass images. each pass has to have a logo, icon, and strip images in png format. footer.png is optional.

createdTime.description: The time when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

updatedTime.description: The time when the entity was last updated in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

createdBy.description: The user who created the entity.

updatedBy.description: The user who last updated the entity.

passName.description: Name of the pass, the name has to be unique within the workspace.

uploadInfoList.description: Wallet pass images. each pass has to have a logo, icon, and strip images in png format. footer.png is optional.

passLink.description: The link where passes can be downloaded. This link will be generated after passes are created.

notificationHeader.description: This is used for Apple passes. The notification header is displayed on the lock screen when a notification is sent to the pass.

appleIssuedCount.description: Total number of users who have added this pass to their Apple Wallets

googleIssuedCount.description: Total number of users who have added this pass to their Google Wallets

totalIssuedCount.description: Total number of users who have added this pass to their wallets (Apple + Google)

appleActiveCount.description: Total number of users who have added this pass to their Apple Wallets and have not removed it

googleActiveCount.description: Total number of users who have added this pass to their Google Wallets and have not removed it

totalActiveCount.description: Total number of users who have added this pass to their wallets (Apple + Google) and have not removed it

passLinkSlug.description: Slug to be used for the pass link. This is used to generate the pass link, if not provided the system will generate a random slug.

googlePassLink.description: Raw link to Google Pass. This link is provided by Google API.

createdTime.description: The time when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

updatedTime.description: The time when the entity was last updated in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

createdBy.description: The user who created the entity.

updatedBy.description: The user who last updated the entity.

workspaceId.description: The ID of the workspace to which this entity belongs.

createdTime.description: The time when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

updatedTime.description: The time when the entity was last updated in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

createdBy.description: The user who created the entity.

updatedBy.description: The user who last updated the entity.

workspaceId.description: workspace id to which the notification belongs.

passSerialNumber.description: Wallet pass id to which the notification belongs.

notificationName.description: Notification name. This is will not appear on pass, it's used internally to identify the notification.

notificationMessage.description: Notification message. For Apple passes, this message will be displayed on the lock screen when a notification is sent to the pass. For Google passes, this message will be displayed at the back of the pass when a notification is sent to the pass.

status.description: Notification status: Draft: Notification will not be sent until the status is changed to Scheduled or ProcessingScheduled: Notification is scheduled to be sent at a specific time. Processing: Notification is being sent. Published: Notification has been sent.Failed: Notification failed to be sent. If the status is not specified at the time of creation, it will be sent immediately.

publishedTime.description: Time when the notification was sent in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

scheduledTime.description: Time when the notification will be sent in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

appleNotificationSentCount.description: Number of active users who have received this notification on their Apple Wallets.

googleNotificationSentCount.description: Number of active users who have received this notification on their Google Wallets.

totalNotificationSentCount.description: Total number of active users who have received this notification on their wallets (Apple + Google).

createdTime.description: The time when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

updatedTime.description: The time when the entity was last updated in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

createdBy.description: The user who created the entity.

updatedBy.description: The user who last updated the entity.

workspaceId.description: The ID of the workspace to which this entity belongs.
